general.gigTitle: design develop and redesign a responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Website Development and Website Maintenance
sellerCard.description:
Hi, I’m Abdul Aziz, a professional website developer with 5+ years of experience. I specialize in creating responsive, SEO-friendly websites using platforms like WordPress, Webflow, Wix, Squarespace, and custom solutions. I also offer website maintenance services, including updates, speed optimization, and security checks, to keep your site running smoothly. Whether you're a small business, a startup, or a digital agency looking to outsource, I deliver high-quality, affordable solutions tailored to your needs. 

Let’s bring your vision to life—contact me today!

description.content:
Welcome! I'm Abdul, a freelancer with 8+ years of experience in WordPress website development. I specialize in creating custom, SEO-friendly, and fully responsive websites tailored to meet the unique needs of your business.


What I Offer:

  • Custom WordPress Design: Unique and user-friendly layouts designed for your brand.
  • Responsive Design: Perfectly optimized for all devices mobile, tablet, and desktop
  • SEO Optimization: Get noticed on search engines with fast, optimized pages
  • E-Commerce Solutions: Set up your online store with WooCommerce integration
  • Website Maintenance: Regular updates, backups, and many more


Why Choose Me?

  1. 100% customer satisfaction guarantee
  2. Timely delivery with high-quality results
  3. Expertise in modern WordPress themes, plugins, and customizations
  4. Affordable packages for small and medium businesses


My Expertise Includes:

  • Business websites
  • Portfolio webpages
  • E-commerce stores
  • Blogs and personal webpages
  • Custom WordPress solutions


How It Works:

  1. Contact me to discuss your requirements.
  2. I'll create a custom solution for your needs.
  3. Receive a professional, high-performing WordPress website!


Ready to elevate your online presence? Order now and let's get started!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is there any examples of your work that i can see?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely, just let me know in a message

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is a WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: WordPress (WordPress.org) is a content management system (CMS) written in PHP paired with a MySQL, MariaDB, or SQLite database

questionsAndAnswers.question: why should i use WordPress for my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: WordPress powers nearly one-third of the world’s websites, from small personal blogs to complex Websites. WordPress is only one of the site builders and CMS users can download and install for free (no license required)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is WordPress easy to Use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: With WordPress, you can easily edit/delete the textual content, graphics on all the pages of your website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is WordPress Theme License?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It is an official agreement / Document that proves you have the license and all the rights to use the template on your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide theme license?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! It is included in the price of all packages If you are okay with the WordPress Theme being preferred by me

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is my satisfaction guaranteed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely, I offer unlimited revisions to all packages, so I'm ready to work until you are fully satisfied.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need to know as much as possible about your business and I will need access to your hosting account or existing WordPress website

packageList.title: Gold
packageList.description: WordPress Responsive website with upto 5 Pages+ Slider, Social Share + Contact Form + Basic SEO

packageList.title: Platinum
packageList.description: Fully Responsive Design with upto 8 Pages+ Plugins Setup+ Google Maps + On-page Optimization.

packageList.title: Diamond
packageList.description: Responsive Design with upto 10 Pages + Payment Gateways + Advance On-page and Technical SEO

reviews.comment: I had the pleasure of working with Abdul, and I can confidently say he deserves all 5 stars! From start to finish, his patience was outstanding. He took the time to understand my needs, answered all my questions, and made sure I was comfortable every step of the way. Not only was he incredibly communicative, but he also worked at an impressive speed without sacrificing quality. The final product exceeded my expectations, and the entire process was seamless. I highly recommend his services to anyone looking for a professional, efficient, and reliable website designer!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was truly a pleasure working with you. I appreciate your trust and am so glad to hear that you’re happy with the final result. Your support and recommendation mean a lot to me. Looking forward to working with you again in the future!

reviews.comment:
I want to take a moment to highlight the outstanding performance of Abdul in creating my website. From start to finish, Abdul demonstrated exceptional professionalism, attention to detail, and a remarkable ability to deliver results in a timely manner.

The website not only met but exceeded my expectations, reflecting Abdul’s technical expertise and creative vision. His commitment to ensuring every aspect of the project was executed flawlessly truly sets him apart.

Abdul’s professionalism and dedication made the entire process seamless, and I am extremely satisfied with the final product. I highly recommend his services to anyone in need of high-quality web design.

Thank you, Abdul, for your exceptional work!

Abdul did an OUTSTANDING job with our website development—his professionalism and ability to exceed expectations truly stood out! Working with him was a breeze; he was polite, cooperative, and delivered everything on time. Highly recommend! 🙌

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! It was a pleasure working with you, and I’m glad I could exceed your expectations. Looking forward to future collaborations!

reviews.comment: Very exceptional and professional to say the least.
Abdul's service and expertise are beyond excellent.  He is extremely knowledgeable and proficient in every aspect of website management.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was an absolute pleasure working with you. I truly appreciate your clear communication and trust throughout the project. I'm looking forward to collaborating again in the future! 😊Thank you
